<title level="1" right="Rules">[Alchemist](/Rules.aspx?ID=1350)</title>

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 195

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An apprentice [alchemist](/Classes.aspx?ID=1) gains the advanced alchemy ability of the alchemy class feature. Their advanced alchemy level is 1, and they have one batch of infused reagents each day. They can make only infused alchemical items.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
